name: Genealogy.genealogyDetailBySavedQuery
description: Returns FastTree saved reports in line detail format.

inputs.notes: Query application name, default is DistInfo
Query group name, default is DistInfo
Used for paging, which record to start from
How many records to limit per page
U for Up or D for Down. Sort the field ascending or descending.
Yes or No. Default is No. This will create a temp file of the requested data for even faster reporting.
Field to perform search on (example: name)
Search term (example: Infotrax* will return anyone starting with Infotrax)
which record to begin search on.
Temp file ID returned from genealogyBySavedQuery

outputs.notes: The fields returned will depend on the fields specified in the FastTree report
